solution_line_template: On a weekday, the shop produces {cups_per_hour_weekday} coffee cups per hour * {hours_open_per_day} hours per weekday = <<{cups_per_hour_weekday}*{hours_open_per_day}={weekday_cups_per_day}>>{weekday_cups_per_day} coffee cups.

The coffee shop therefore brewed {weekday_cups_per_day} coffee cups per day * {weekdays_in_week} weekdays in a week = <<{weekday_cups_per_day}*{weekdays_in_week}={total_weekday_cups}>>{total_weekday_cups} coffee cups.

So in total, the coffee shop brewed a total of {total_weekday_cups} weekday coffee cups + {weekend_cups_total} weekend coffee cups = <<{total_weekday_cups}+{weekend_cups_total}={total_cups_in_week}>>{total_cups_in_week} coffee cups in 1 week.
